originalText.text:
Dr Hayashi, was a really great resource for me. She explained what was going on very well, and explained what i needed to know. Since it was the first time at the podiatrist, she explained to me the basics in a way i could understand. I really appreciated that, and offered insight what needs to be done to be more like athletes.
Well worth it.

originalText.text: I have been a patient of Dr Hyashi for a year, during which time I have found her to be very committed to providing outstanding patient care. She is very knowledgeable and passionate about her work and it clearly shows. Dr Hiyashi always take a lot of time and care to examine me, check on symptoms and discuss options/next steps. She works to find solutions to complex issue. She is very detailed and clear in her communications. I also find all the staff at her office to be very kind, polite and helpful. 5 star experience all round!

originalText.text: My experience at Dr. Hayashi was great! She's not just any Doctor. She took her time to explain my condition in details and a prevention plan to avoid my condition from worsening. Her staff are very pleasant and just as professional as she was. This facility is definitely some where i highly recommend others  to go if you're experiencing any foot or ankle problem!

originalText.text: Dr. Hayashi is extremely caring and professional.  She patiently spent a lot of her time understanding my chronic issue which has bothered me over 5 years, and designed a tailored regimen that has since helped relieve most of my pain. I am very grateful to know Dr. Hayashi.  The office staff (especially Yas) are also very courteous and kind.  I highly recommend Dr. Hayashi to anyone who are suffering from foot related injuries and pain.

originalText.text: Dr. Hayashi is amazing! I struggled with very bad lower back pain due to high arches and living a very active lifestyle. Dr. Hayashi's custom made insoles completely resolved all my pain. I have been using Dr. Hayashi's products for 10 years and couldn't feel any better. Highly recommended .
